briefTitle: Study Investigating a Delayed-Release Pancrelipase in Patients With Exocrine Pancreatic Insufficiency Due to Cystic Fibrosis
officialTitle: A Double-blind, Randomized, Multi-center, Placebo-controlled, Cross-over Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Pancrelipase Delayed Release 24,000 Unit Capsules in Subjects With Pancreatic Exocrine Insufficiency Due to Cystic Fibrosis
summary: This study will assess the effect of pancrelipase delayed release 24,000 unit capsules on fat and nitrogen absorption in subjects with PEI due to Cystic Fibrosis.

commonTop: Gastrointestinal and abdominal pain (Excl oral and throat)
